summary: Email chain between prosecutors and defense attorneys regarding the identification and subpoena of a JPMorgan Chase (JPMC) witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The emails discuss Bates ranges for account opening documents related to Maxwell and other accounts, and coordination for witness testimony.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell; mentioned in relation to JPMorgan account onboarding documents.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Attorney from WilmerHale corresponding with prosecutors about JPMorgan witness and document production for the Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Anjan Sahni
persons.context: Prosecutor from the Southern District of New York copied on emails regarding JPMorgan witness and document subpoena.

persons.name: Maurene
persons.context: Recipient of email from Allison Stoddart regarding providing a trial appearance subpoena to JPMorgan.

persons.name: Lara
persons.context: Recipient of email from Allison Stoddart regarding providing a trial appearance subpoena to JPMorgan.

connections.description: Communicating and coordinating on legal matters related to the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, specifically regarding JPMorgan witness and document production.
Allison Stoddart, as part of the defense team, is working on document production and witness coordination for Maxwell's trial.

events.title: Email coordination for JPMorgan witness
events.description: Final email confirming Bates ranges for JPMorgan account documents have been saved for a witness who will testify.

events.title: Call scheduling for witness discussion
events.description: Prosecutor proposes a call for 3 p.m. to discuss trial witness topic with defense attorney Allison Stoddart.

events.title: Subpoena discussion for JPMorgan witness
events.description: Email exchange regarding providing a broadly worded subpoena to JPMorgan for a trial witness.

keyFacts: A JPMorgan Chase (JPMC) employee is being prepared as a witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
Specific Bates ranges for account opening documents related to three account numbers and Ghislaine Maxwell's onboarding documents were identified and provided.
The correspondence shows coordination between defense attorneys (WilmerHale) and prosecutors (Southern District of New York) regarding witness testimony and document production.
A trial appearance subpoena was requested for the JPMorgan witness.
The document references financial records from JPMorgan, indicating the investigation into financial aspects of the case.
